user_query: I want to search for a trader with the nickname 'CryptoKing' on the Binance Futures Leaderboard. Retrieve their performance data and provide me with their follower count. Additionally, fetch the tokens available on the Ethereum network.

TaskList.description: Search for the trader 'CryptoKing' on the Binance Futures Leaderboard.
Retrieve the performance data of the trader 'CryptoKing'. This step depends on the result of Step 1.
Get the follower count for the trader 'CryptoKing'. This step depends on the result of Step 2.
Fetch the tokens available on the Ethereum network.
